EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Excluding Option, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost to be recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Option, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost to be recognized for option under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCashContri.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Cash Contributions to ESOP
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCashContri.description: This item represents the amount of cash contributions during the period made by the entity to the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Compensation Expense
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.description: The amount of plan compensation cost recognized during the period.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPSharesInES.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Shares in ESOP
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPSharesInES.description: Sum of the allocated, committed-to-be-released and suspense shares of the entity held by the plan.

EquipmentExpense.label: Equipment Expense
EquipmentExpense.description: This element represents equipment expense including depreciation, repairs, rentals, and service contract costs. This item also includes equipment purchases which do not qualify for capitalization in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. This item may also include furniture expenses.

EquityIssuanceTotalDollarAmount.label: Equity Issuance, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
EquityIssuanceTotalDollarAmount.description: The total dollar amount assigned to the consideration received for equity securities issued during a specific stock issuance.

EquityMethodInvestmentSoldCarryingAmount.label: Equity Method Investment, Amount Sold
EquityMethodInvestmentSoldCarryingAmount.description: Amount of the entity's equity method investment which has been sold.

EquitySecuritiesFvNi.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI
EquitySecuritiesFvNi.description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

ExcessCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital, Excess, Actual
ExcessCapital.description: Amount of total risk-based capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

ExcessCapitalToRiskWeightedAssets.label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Excess, Actual
ExcessCapitalToRiskWeightedAssets.description: Ratio of total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

ExcessTierOneLeverageCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Excess Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
ExcessTierOneLeverageCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

ExcessTierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAss.label: Banking Regulation, Excess Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Actual
ExcessTierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAss.description: Ratio of Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

ExcessTierOneRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Excess, Actual
ExcessTierOneRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

ExcessTierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeigh.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Excess, Actual
ExcessTierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeigh.description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

FairValueAssumptionsRiskFreeInterestRate.label: Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FairValueAssumptionsRiskFreeInterestRate.description: Risk-free interest rate assumption used in valuing an instrument.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Transfers, Net
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of transfer of financial instrument classified as an asset into (out of) level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

FederalDepositInsuranceCorporationPremiu.label: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation Premium Expense
FederalDepositInsuranceCorporationPremiu.description: Amount of expense for Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Average Balance of Agreements Outstanding
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.description: The calculated average balance outstanding for the year for all Federal Home Loan Bank advances as of the Balance Sheet date.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Average Interest Rate for Year
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.description: The calculated weighted average interest rate for Federal Home Loan Bank advances for the period ended as of the Balance Sheet date.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Maximum Outstanding at any Month End
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesActivityForYe.description: The maximum balance outstanding at any month end during the period as of the Balance Sheet date.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBB.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Branch of FHLB Bank, Amount of Advances
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBB.description: Amount of advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBB.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Branch of FHLB Bank, Weighted Average Interest Rate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesBranchOfFHLBB.description: Describes the weighted average interest rate applicable to the specific advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank, by branch, as of the Balance Sheet date.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Amount of Available, Unused Funds
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.description: Amount of advances or credit lines available from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Collateral Pledged
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.description: Amount of the collateral pledged in support of federal home loan bank advances outstanding.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Maximum Amount Available
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.description: Amount of maximum advances or credit lines available from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Repayment and Penalties
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesGeneralDebtOb.description: Amount of repayments and penalties incurred in the satisfaction or roll-over of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) advance.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of federal home loan bank advances. Advances are loans from the federal home loan bank system to a member (shareholder).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Average Interest Rate, Year Five
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Average Interest Rate, Year One
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Average Interest Rate, Year Two
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Average Interest Rate, Year Four
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Average Interest Rate, Year Three
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Fixed Rate, Year One
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, after Year One Through Five
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Five
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Two
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Four
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Three
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year One
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAvera.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesWeightedAvera.description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

FederalHomeLoanBankStock.label: Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
FederalHomeLoanBankStock.description: Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

FederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuing.label: Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
FederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuing.description: Amount of current and deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations.

FeesAndCommissionsDepositorAccounts.label: Fees and Commissions, Depositor Accounts (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FeesAndCommissionsDepositorAccounts.description: Includes amounts charged depositors for: (1) maintenance of their accounts (maintenance charges); (2) failure to maintain specified minimum balances on account; (3) exceeding the number of checks or transactions allowed to be processed in a given period; (4) checks drawn on no minimum balance deposit accounts; (5) withdrawals from nontransaction deposit accounts; (6) closing savings accounts before a specified minimum period of time has elapsed; (7) accounts which have remained inactive for extended periods of time or which have become dormant; (8) use of automated teller machines or remote service units; (9) checks drawn against insufficient funds that the bank assesses regardless of whether it decides to pay, return or hold the check; (10) issuing stop payment orders; (11) certifying checks; and (12) accumulating or disbursing funds deposited in IRAs or Keogh Plan accounts when not handled by the bank's trust department. This item does not include penalties assessed on the early withdrawal of time deposits.

FeesAndCommissionsMortgageBankingAndServ.label: Fees and Commissions, Mortgage Banking and Servicing
FeesAndCommissionsMortgageBankingAndServ.description: Income from mortgage banking activities (fees and commissions) and servicing real estate mortgages, credit cards, and other financial assets held by others net of any related impairment of capitalized service costs. Also includes any premiums received in lieu of regular servicing fees on such loans only as earned over the life of the loans.

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCol.label: Financial Instruments, Owned and Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCol.description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity and pledged to counterparties as collateral, including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedMortgagesMortga.label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Mortgages, Mortgage-backed and Asset-backed Securities, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedMortgagesMortga.description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in mortgages, mortgage backed securities (investment instruments that represent ownership of an undivided interest in a group of mortgages, where principal and interest from the individual mortgages are used to pay investors' principal and interest on the mortgage backed security) and asset-backed securities that are primarily paid from the cash flows of a discrete pool of receivables or other financial assets (such as credit-card receivables), either fixed or revolving, that by their terms convert into cash within a finite time period. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedUSGovernmentAnd.label: Financial Instruments, Owned, US Government and Agency Obligations, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedUSGovernmentAnd.description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in debt obligations issued by the US government including short-term Treasury bills, medium-term Treasury notes, and long-term Treasury bonds, as well as debt issued by agencies. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts
FinancingReceivableModificationsNumberOf.description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Post-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.description: Amount of investment in financing receivables (after modification) modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Postmodification
FinancingReceivableModificationsPostModi.description: Amount, after troubled debt restructuring, of modified financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Pre-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.description: The amount of the outstanding recorded investment related to financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings before the financing receivable has been modified.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Pre-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.description: Amount of investment in financing receivables (before modification) modified by troubled debt restructurings.

FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Premodification
FinancingReceivableModificationsPreModif.description: Amount, before troubled debt restructuring, of financing receivable to be modified.

FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring
FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Subsequent Default, Number of Contracts
FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.description: Number of financing receivable contracts modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.label: Financing Receivable, Reclassification to Held-for-sale
FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.description: Amount of financing receivable reclassified to held-for-sale.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment30T.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 30 to 59 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment30T.description: Financing receivables that are less than 60 days past due but more than 29 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment60T.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 60 to 89 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment60T.description: Financing receivables that are less than 90 days past due but more than 59 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.label: Financing Receivable, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.description: Amount of financing receivable 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.label: Financing Receivable, Not Past Due
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.description: Amount of financing receivable not past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentEqu.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, Equal to Greater than 90 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentEqu.description: Financing receivables that are equal to or greater than 90 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentPas.label: Financing Receivable, Past Due
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentPas.description: Amount of financing receivable past due.

FinancingReceivablesImpairedTroubledDebt.label: Financing Receivables, Impaired, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Write-down
FinancingReceivablesImpairedTroubledDebt.description: Reflects the amount of the write-down related to a troubled debt restructuring.

FurnitureAndFixturesGross.label: Furniture and Fixtures, Gross
FurnitureAndFixturesGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of equipment commonly used in offices and stores that have no permanent connection to the structure of a building or utilities. Examples include, but are not limited to, desks, chairs, tables, and bookcases.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, excluding oil and gas property and timber property.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GainLossOnSaleOfLoansAndLeases.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Loans and Leases
GainLossOnSaleOfLoansAndLeases.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans and leases that were sold during the reporting period. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sales. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Other Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for investments classified as other.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfSecuritiesNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Securities, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
GainLossOnSaleOfSecuritiesNet.description: The net gain (loss) realized from the sale, exchange, redemption, or retirement of securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity.

GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Other Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of other real estate owned, increases (decreases) in the valuation allowance for foreclosed real estate, and write-downs of other real estate owned after acquisition or physical possession.

GeneralInsuranceExpense.label: General Insurance Expense
GeneralInsuranceExpense.description: The expense in the period incurred with respect to protection provided by insurance entities against risks other than risks associated with production (which are allocated to cost of sales).

HeldToMaturitySecurities.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity
HeldToMaturitySecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Accumulated Unrecognized Gain
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.description: Amount of accumulated unrecognized gain on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Accumulated Unrecognized Loss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAmortizedCostBef.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Amortized Cost, before Other-than-temporary Impairment
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAmortizedCostBef.description: Amount, before other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) accretion, of investment in debt securities measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous loss position for 12 months or longer.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Unrealized Loss Position, Accumulated Loss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in unrealized loss position.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Unrealized Loss Position, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in unrealized loss position.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous loss position for less than 12 months.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year One Through Five
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year One Through Five
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesFa.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Debt Maturities, Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesFa.description: This item represents the total of all debt securities grouped by maturity dates, at fair value, which are categorized as held-to-maturity.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNe.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Debt Maturities, Net Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesNe.description: Carrying amount of debt securities accounted for as held-to-maturity, net of adjustments including, but not limited to, accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments (OTTI) recognized, and fair value hedge accounting adjustments.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Unrecognized Holding Gain (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.description: Amount of unrecognized gain before loss on investments in held-to-maturity securities.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Unrecognized Holding Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesUnrecognizedHold.description: Amount of unrecognized loss before gain on investments in held-to-maturity securities. Excludes write-down for other than temporary impairment (OTTI).

HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investments in held-to-maturity securities that have been in a loss position for twelve months or longer.

HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investments in held-to-maturity securities.

HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
HeldtomaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Amount of unrealized loss before deducting unrealized gain on investments in held-to-maturity securities that have been in a loss position for less than twelve months.

ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareBas.label: Impact of Restatement on Earnings Per Share, Basic (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareBas.description: Per share amount effect of a restatement of results of operations on basic earnings per share.

ImpactOfRestatementOnOpeningRetainedEarn.label: Impact of Restatement on Opening Retained Earnings, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
ImpactOfRestatementOnOpeningRetainedEarn.description: Amount after tax of cumulative effect of restatement on the opening retained earnings of the earliest year presented.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Average Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.description: Average amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Accrual Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.description: Amount of interest income recognized that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Cash Basis Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.description: Amount of interest income recognized on a cash-basis method of accounting that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Related Allowance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.description: Amount of allowance for credit losses related to recorded investment.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Average Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.description: Amount of average investment of impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Interest Income, Accrual Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.description: Amount of interest income, recognized on accrual basis, on financing receivables that are recognized as impaired, for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Average Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.description: Amount of average investment of impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Interest Income, Accrual Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.description: Amount of interest income, recognized on accrual basis, on financing receivables, for which there is a related allowance for credit losses and are recognized as impaired.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.description: Unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

IncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingIn.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingIn.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity
IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.description: The sum of the tax effects of all items occurring during the period that have been charged or credited directly to other comprehensive income or to related components of shareholders' equity.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.description: The sum of the current income tax expense or benefit and the deferred income tax expense or benefit pertaining to pretax Income or Loss from continuing operations; income tax expense or benefit may include interest and penalties on tax uncertainties based on the entity's accounting policy.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Reconciling Items, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax exempt income, equity in earnings (loss) of an unconsolidated subsidiary, minority noncontrolling interest income (loss), tax holiday, disposition of a business, disposition of an asset, repatriation of foreign earnings, repatriation of foreign earnings jobs creation act of 2004, increase (decrease) in enacted tax rate, prior year income taxes, increase (decrease) in deferred tax asset valuation allowance, and other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsOther.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Other, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsOther.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInDeposits.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period deposits balances.

IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.label: Increase (Decrease) in Interest Payable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInLoansDeferredIncome.label: Increase (Decrease) in Loans, Deferred Income
IncreaseDecreaseInLoansDeferredIncome.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in net unamortized loan origination fees and other fees that are collected at origination but recorded as income over the life of the loan.

IncreaseDecreaseInLoansHeldForSale.label: Increase (Decrease) in Loans Held-for-sale
IncreaseDecreaseInLoansHeldForSale.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of loans or securitized loans that are held with the intention to sell in the near future.

IncreaseDecreaseInMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Increase (Decrease) in Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
IncreaseDecreaseInMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of mortgage loans that are held with the intention to sell or be securitized in the near future.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherLoans.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Loans
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherLoans.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealer.label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealer.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations incurred arising from transactions with broker-dealers, such as amounts due on margin and unsettled cash transactions; includes payables to brokers, dealers and clearing organizations.

IncreaseDecreaseInPensionPlanObligations.label: Increase (Decrease) in Obligation, Pension Benefits
IncreaseDecreaseInPensionPlanObligations.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit or defined contribution plans. Excludes other postretirement benefits.

IncreaseDecreaseInPremiumsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Premiums Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInPremiumsReceivable.description: The change in the premium receivable balance on the balance sheet.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

IncrementalEffectOnBalanceSheetLiability.label: Incremental Effect on Balance Sheet, Liability or Equity Line Item Change Due to Additional Minimum Pension Liability (AML) Adjustment, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
IncrementalEffectOnBalanceSheetLiability.description: Changes in individual asset line items in the year-end statement of financial position that are incrementally affected by the additional minimum pension liability (AML) adjustment by the recognition provisions of FAS 158 in the year of initial application.

InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.label: Information Technology and Data Processing
InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.description: The amount of expenses incurred in the period for information technology and data processing products and services.

InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.description: Represents the total of interest and dividend income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, earned from (1) loans and leases whether held-for-sale or held-in-portfolio; (2) investment securities; (3) federal funds sold; (4) securities purchased under agreements to resell; (5) investments in banker's acceptances, commercial paper, or certificates of deposit; (6) dividend income; or (7) other investments not otherwise specified herein.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestAndOtherIncome.label: Interest and Other Income
InterestAndOtherIncome.description: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomesti.label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Domestic
InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomesti.description: Total amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities, which may include brokered, retail, demand, checking, notice of withdrawal, money market and other interest-bearing deposits.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositBrokered.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Brokered
InterestBearingDomesticDepositBrokered.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic third-party deposits placed by or through the assistance of a deposit broker, also known as brokered deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposits
InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic certificate of deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Checking
InterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic checking deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositMoneyMarke.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Money Market
InterestBearingDomesticDepositMoneyMarke.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositSavings.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Savings
InterestBearingDomesticDepositSavings.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities. Saving deposits bear interest and have no stated maturity.

InterestbearingDomesticDepositOther.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Other
InterestbearingDomesticDepositOther.description: Amount of other interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseBorrowings.label: Interest Expense, Borrowings
InterestExpenseBorrowings.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all borrowings.

InterestExpenseDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Deposits
InterestExpenseDeposits.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitie.label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Checking
InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitie.description: Amount of interest expense on domestic checking deposit liabilities.

InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitie.label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Withdrawal Penalties
InterestExpenseDomesticDepositLiabilitie.description: Early withdrawal penalties on domestic deposits which discourage customer withdrawal prior to maturity.

InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFed.label: Interest Expense, Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank Advances, Long-term
InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFed.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on long-term borrowings associated with Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances.

InterestExpenseMoneyMarketDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Money Market Deposits
InterestExpenseMoneyMarketDeposits.description: Interest expense incurred on all money market deposits.

InterestExpenseNegotiableOrderOfWithdraw.label: Interest Expense, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) Deposits
InterestExpenseNegotiableOrderOfWithdraw.description: Interest expense incurred on the amount of Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW). Interest-bearing transaction account that combines the payable on demand feature of checks and investment feature of savings accounts. A NOW account is functionally an interest paying checking account.

InterestExpenseNOWAccountsMoneyMarketAcc.label: Interest Expense, NOW Accounts, Money Market Accounts, and Savings Deposits
InterestExpenseNOWAccountsMoneyMarketAcc.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on the following for deposits in domestic offices: (1) transaction accounts (NOW, and telephone and preauthorized transfer accounts), (2) money market deposits and (3) savings deposits.

InterestExpenseOtherDomesticDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Other Domestic Deposits
InterestExpenseOtherDomesticDeposits.description: Interest expense incurred on other deposits in domestic offices.

InterestExpenseSavingsDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Savings Deposits
InterestExpenseSavingsDeposits.description: Interest expense incurred on all savings account deposits.

InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.label: Interest Expense, Subordinated Notes and Debentures
InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on subordinated notes and debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

InterestExpenseTimeDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Time Deposits
InterestExpenseTimeDeposits.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, in domestic offices.

InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestIncomeMoneyMarketDeposits.label: Interest Income, Money Market Deposits
InterestIncomeMoneyMarketDeposits.description: Interest earned on funds deposited in US domestic money market accounts.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InterestIncomeSecuritiesMortgageBacked.label: Interest Income, Securities, Mortgage Backed
InterestIncomeSecuritiesMortgageBacked.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securitized, pass-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InterestReceivableAndOtherAssets.label: Interest Receivable and Other Assets
InterestReceivableAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of interest receivable and assets classified as other.

InterestReceivableCurrent.label: Interest Receivable, Current
InterestReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of current interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Investments.label: Investments
Investments.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all investments.

InvestmentsFairValueDisclosure.label: Investments, Fair Value Disclosure
InvestmentsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of investment securities, including, but not limited to, marketable securities, derivative financial instruments, and investments accounted for under the equity method.

LaborAndRelatedExpense.label: Labor and Related Expense
LaborAndRelatedExpense.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

Land.label: Land
Land.description: Amount before accumulated depletion of real estate held for productive use, excluding land held for sale.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

LeaseholdImprovementsGross.label: Leasehold Improvements, Gross
LeaseholdImprovementsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.label: Line of Credit Facility, Average Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.description: Average amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate at Period End
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.description: The effective interest rate at the end of the reporting period.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate During Period
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.description: The effective interest rate during the reporting period.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumMonthendOutst.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Month-end Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumMonthendOutst.description: Maximum month-end amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

LinesOfCreditCurrent.label: Line of Credit, Current
LinesOfCreditCurrent.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LoanPortfolioExpense.label: Loan Portfolio Expense
LoanPortfolioExpense.description: The loan servicing fees paid to third parties that relate to loan expenses for a portfolio containing the entire group of loans owned by the company.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableBeforeFeesGross.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, before Fees, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableBeforeFeesGross.description: Amount, before allowance and fees, of loans and leases receivable. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercial.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercial.description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans and leases receivable includes, but not limited to, commercial and industrial loans, agricultural loans, mortgage loans, promissory notes, interbank and other loans to financial institutions, draws against credit facilities, trade financing, lease financings. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialNetOfD.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Commercial, Net of Deferred Income (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialNetOfD.description: Reflects the net carrying amount of commercial loans and leases held in portfolio, after deducting deferred income, but before deducting the allowance for losses on commercial loans and leases.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumer.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumer.description: Amount before allowance of consumer loans, including, but not limited to, mortgage, home equity, vehicles, credit card, installment, and lease financing. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerOther.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Other (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
